item.title: Why Fedora
item.description: If you are considering switching to Linux, or have already made the dicision but cannot pick a distribution, or if you are just curious continue reading. I have tried lots of operating systems. All as daily drivers over a period of time. Out of all these I like Fedora the most, and think Fedora should be the ideal operating system of choice for most desktop users and most use cases (including developers).
